thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk
thread.title: Mark Odell
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Mark Odell

author: Mark Odell
title: Mark Odell
text: I ordered flowers for my parent's wedding anniversary. I usually use Interflora. Why did I change? I have just tracked the flowers for their delivery date and see that they will be delivered the next day. What is the point in using a company that cannot deliver for when you order. Truly shoddy.
